title: On the Steep Slope of College Affordability, a Toehold
description: The enduring expense of higher education has reached Olympian heights. Nonprofit agencies are trying to offer some modest forms of relief.
dc:creator: Callie Holtermann
category: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
Community Service Society of New York
media:credit: Christopher Gregory for The New York Times
media:description: Samuel Polanco Jr. graduated from Lehman College in 2020 with a major in media and communication studies and a minor in nutrition. Having a bachelor’s degree, he said, “opens doors.”
